home-hero-section.subtitle: Rarime lives right In your Metamask. It’s where you securely keep, manage your credentials, attestations, social identity, licenses, event tickets, and more — all in one place
home-hero-section.description: *The Rarime snap guarantees user control by never accessing the Private Key
home-hero-section.card-text-1: Add social identity and manage directly from the wallet

home-banner.text-1: to preserve full user control, the Private Key is
home-banner.text-bold: never accessed by The Rarime snap.
home-banner.text-2: Even if the wallet is unlocked or compromised, the PK cannot be stolen.
